project_summary.title: Phoenix Hydra: Self-Derived AI and Multimedia Automation
project_summary.description: A self-hosted automation stack using NCA Toolkit for multimedia processing and AI workflows, designed for enterprise-readiness and open-source flexibility.
project_summary.competitive_advantage: Self-hosted, open-source, enterprise-ready, and modular cellular architecture.

team.tech_stack: n8n, Windmill, NCA Toolkit, Podman, systemd
